title: mc_rbdyn::lipm_stabilizer::ExternalWrenchConfiguration
description: Parameters for external wrench compensation. See {% doxygen mc_rbdyn::lipm_stabilizer::ExternalWrenchConfiguration %} for detailed usage.

add_expected_com_offset.description: Whether to add the CoM offset expected from the external wrenches.

subtract_measured_value.description: Use the measured external wrenches instead of target ones

modify_com_error.description: Modify CoM depending on the error of the external wrenches in target and measurement

modify_zmp_error.description: Modify ZMP depending on the error of the external wrenches in target and measurement

modify_zmp_error_d.description: Modify ZMP velocity depending on the error of the external wrenches in target and measurement

com_offset_err_com_limit.description: Limit of CoM offset error handled by CoM modification [m]

com_offset_err_zmp_limit.description: Limit of ZMP offset error handled by ZMP modification [m]

ext_wrench_sum_cutoff.description: Cutoff period [s] for the low-pass filter of the sum of the measured external wrenches

com_offset_cutoff.description: Cutoff period [s] for the low-pass filter of CoM offset

com_offset_com_cutoff.description: Cutoff period [s] for the low-pass filter of CoM offset to extract CoM modification

derivator_time_constant.description: Time window [s] for the stationary offset filter of the CoM offset derivator
